content: hi
there welcome to this jam snack my name is obi na ikuno and i'm a software
engineer at gatsby i'm here to tell you about exciting
features currently available in gatsby and gatsby cloud
and also to give you a hint of what's coming in the near future
over the past months gatsby has improved on some of its existing features
like the createpages api with the new file system api that helps you create
pages programmatically which becomes more intuitive you can now
build multiple versions of your sites like one for staging one for production
from the same repo cool right and you can now log in and
add repositories from gitlab and also github there are also some new
things to play around with and to share feedback on
like gatsby admin and gatsby gatsby desktop
which supercharges your local development flow by giving you a gui
for adding and configuring plugins for your gatsby sites
and restarting development process the ultimate goal is to reduce the friction
and drive down the time to first moment of wow
when you get like a new site to say hello world and adding more plugins
gatsby admin is currently experimental or you can use this with the cli flag
and we are in the process of collecting feedback to learn more
you can hit me up on twitter or follow us at gatsby as we will be announcing
this feature soon thank you all so much for coming to this
jam snack
bye you
